page.title: 02 FARMING IN SYMINGTON 1985
page.content: The farmer I interviewed has{114}cows. He does not have any more cows because of the{MILK QUOTA.}The Milk Quota was introduced to try to cut down the butter mountain to a butter hill. This is an E.E.C. ruling. A cow has to be washed,clipped,combed then kept clean though the night and while travelling before going to market.He goes to{KILMARNOCK }and {AYR market because they are the nearest to him. He has not got any pigs because he has not got the room for them. He has {48}lambs left from lambing time. He said that there is going to be major development in the next 2 years and it is to make things easier for him and his 2 sons. The things he is making are a new shed,a parlour,2 silage pits and a slurry tank.
